SetupDone.Name: Setup applied
SetupDone.Hint: Internal flag to prevent overwriting manual Item Piles settings after the initial setup.

Reset.Name: Reset recommended settings
Reset.Hint: Re-apply the recommended Item Piles configuration for Mausritter.
Reset.Label: Open

Reset.Title: Item Piles: Mausritter | Reset configuration
Reset.Body1: This will re-apply the recommended Item Piles settings for Mausritter (currency, item price attribute, pile actor type, and no stacking).
Reset.WarningText: This overwrites your current Item Piles settings.

Notifications.ResetDone: Item Piles: Mausritter | Recommended configuration has been re-applied.
